text: Dāngshí, wǒ yǔ nǐmen dìyuē, bìng zài nǐmen shàngmiàn shēng qǐ “tǔ lēi”(shān), wǒ shuō:“Nǐmen dāng jiānshǒu wǒ suǒ cì nǐmen de jīngdiǎn, bìng dāng tīngcóng.” Tāmen shuō:“Wǒmen tīng ér bù cóng.” Tāmen bù xìndào, gù duì dú zhī ài, yǐ jìnrùnle tāmen de xīnlíng. Nǐ shuō:“Rúguǒ nǐmen shì xìnshì, nàme, nǐmen de xìnyǎng suǒ mìng nǐmen de zhēn èliè!”
